channel.title: Stupid Rant about Private Servers
channel.description:
Is it sad that I can't find a home private server? No. Why? Because they're all to "mainstream" (is that the word? Probably not...) today. The good private servers weren't created to generate profit for the owner, which it seems that all it is today. I've countlessly tried to find a private server, I'll even log into one and I see that I pick a starter and all my skill are up to high 70's, and even before that I look at their website and if you vote for them you get shitton of gold ingame. I logged out and deleted the cache from my computer almost instantly. Why can't I go back to the good old days, and actually have fun competing for the top of a private server without having to donate my way there? Why can't we have good servers? Sure, a server owner would probably comment saying "My server isn't for profit" or other shit like that, or "we have a stable economy" when no, you don't. If I can just pay $20 and get a godsword or a max cash stack, then your economy is just as bad as Americas. Don't try to advertise "Good economy" then below that "Great benefits/reward for donating"
Just my little rant, add, discuss, hate, ect.

item.title: Stupid Rant about Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:94, topic:423064”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=525718.msg3840950#msg3840950 date=1323219062]

Donations is just about the only way to keep the server running. Nobody is going to donate just to be nice.

I would, if I like the server enough.
Yes, donations should get some sort of reward, but they shouldn’t be something that destroys the economy.
[/quote]
Cosmetic maybe (bow-sword etc.), more convenient training locations or a few weapons that cannot be used on the free players (same concept as members coming to a free world in RS). Too many servers have dragon claws etc. for donating which is bullshit and pathetic in my opinion (to even have dragon claws in the first place is worse).[/quote]
I don’t care about Dragon Claws, get them from a hard-ass monster, make them not so you can pay $50 and lead the server on Day 1.

Read full topic

Cosmetic maybe (bow-sword etc.), more convenient training locations or a few weapons that cannot be used on the free players (same concept as members coming to a free world in RS). Too many servers have dragon claws etc. for donating which is bullshit and pathetic in my opinion (to even have dragon claws in the first place is worse).

item.title: Stupid Rant about Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:78, topic:423064”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=525718.msg3830687#msg3830687 date=1322535033]

i feel the same way about today’s cartoons. teenage mutant ninja turtles was my favorite.

have you guys seen the new charlie browns??? its kinda different. like the got a new artist makes me a lil sad… good show though

Yea, and the voicing is different.
I miss the old Looney Toons. Nothing was better then seeing anvils smashing people on the head. I watched them on saturday mornings (years 99-03 or so for me), but it seems one day they just went away. Anyone know what happened?

that’s what happen to all the shows, they seem to just disappear…
[/quote]

Phased out of society. I don’t understand how old people go around saying video games increases violence in kids, and society makes the attempt to pressure them into drugs and alcohol when they used to watch Tom step on mouse traps, get hit by anvils, hammers, bowling balls, you name it. How about daffy duck getting shot with a shotgun, or the massive handful of smoking and alcohol use in the cartoons. If you listen to them today vs. being a child, you’ll notice stereotypes and racism toward Germans, Japanese, Chinese, and blacks.[/quote]
Don’t forget sex.

Read full topic
